question_title: What will be the value of "Overnight Repurchase Agreements: Treasury Securities Purchased by the Federal Reserve in the Temporary Open Market Operations" on 2026-02-10?
summary: The RPONTSYD series tracks overnight Treasury repo operations by the Fed, which have been essentially dormant recently (0.000-0.002 billion in late January 2026). The Fed ended quantitative tightening in December 2025, reducing systemic pressure. February 10 is a regular Tuesday with no month-end, quarter-end, or special liquidity pressures. While tail events are possible (Oct 2025: $29.4B, Dec 2025: $74.6B spikes), these were driven by specific pressures that don't apply. The distribution is heavily concentrated near zero with fat tails for unexpected stress events.

factors.description: Recent FRED data (Jan 26-30, 2026) shows values of 0.000-0.002 billion, indicating series is essentially dormant under current conditions
Fed ended quantitative tightening December 1, 2025, reducing systemic pressure on bank reserves and liquidity
February 10 is a regular Tuesday with no month-end, quarter-end, or major Treasury settlement pressures
Bank reserves at 'merely ample' levels (~$3 trillion) - less cushion than before, occasional stress possible
Historical tail events show sudden spikes are possible: Oct 2025 ($29.4B), Dec 2025 ($74.6B) - creates fat-tailed distribution
